## What's Changed
* make `MpvRenderContext`  `params` parameter take a const slice of `MpvRenderParam` by @hasanpasha in https://github.com/hasanpasha/zmpv/pull/17


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hasanpasha/zmpv/compare/1.2.0...1.2.1

## What's Changed
* Optional `Mpv.create_client*` name parameter by @hasanpasha in https://github.com/hasanpasha/zmpv/pull/13
* revert "return `*Mpv` instead of `Mpv` in `create*` functions" by @hasanpasha in https://github.com/hasanpasha/zmpv/pull/16
* Redesign create  helper functions by @hasanpasha in https://github.com/hasanpasha/zmpv/pull/15
* set return error union type explicitly for all functions by @hasanpasha in https://github.com/hasanpasha/zmpv/pull/14


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hasanpasha/zmpv/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0
